title: Data race in service test
body:
The CI `make test-race` step discovered:

https://github.com/flashbots/mev-boost/runs/7696230374?check_suite_focus=true#step:4:118

```
==================
WARNING: DATA RACE
Write at 0x00c0002a5fa0 by goroutine 12:
  github.com/flashbots/mev-boost/server.TestRegisterValidator.func2()
      /home/runner/work/mev-boost/mev-boost/server/service_test.go:208 +0x37b
  testing.tRunner()
      /opt/hostedtoolcache/go/1.18.4/x64/src/testing/testing.go:1439 +0x213
  testing.(*T).Run.func1()
      /opt/hostedtoolcache/go/1.18.4/x64/src/testing/testing.go:1486 +0x47

Previous read at 0x00c0002a5fa0 by goroutine 18:
  github.com/flashbots/mev-boost/server.(*mockRelay).handleRegisterValidator()
      /home/runner/work/mev-boost/mev-boost/server/mock_relay.go:126 +0x6d
  github.com/flashbots/mev-boost/server.(*mockRelay).handleRegisterValidator-fm()
      <autogenerated>:1 +0x57
  net/http.HandlerFunc.ServeHTTP()
      /opt/hostedtoolcache/go/1.18.4/x64/src/net/http/server.go:2084 +0x4d
  github.com/gorilla/mux.(*Router).ServeHTTP()
      /home/runner/go/pkg/mod/github.com/gorilla/mux@v1.8.0/mux.go:210 +0x361
  github.com/flashbots/mev-boost/server.(*mockRelay).newTestMiddleware.func1()
      /home/runner/work/mev-boost/mev-boost/server/mock_relay.go:83 +0x1d1
  net/http.HandlerFunc.ServeHTTP()
      /opt/hostedtoolcache/go/1.18.4/x64/src/net/http/server.go:2084 +0x4d
  net/http.serverHandler.ServeHTTP()
      /opt/hostedtoolcache/go/1.18.4/x64/src/net/http/server.go:2916 +0x896
  net/http.(*conn).serve()
      /opt/hostedtoolcache/go/1.18.4/x64/src/net/http/server.go:1966 +0xbaa
  net/http.(*Server).Serve.func3()
      /opt/hostedtoolcache/go/1.18.4/x64/src/net/http/server.go:3071 +0x58

Goroutine 12 (running) created at:
  testing.(*T).Run()
      /opt/hostedtoolcache/go/1.18.4/x64/src/testing/testing.go:1486 +0x724
  github.com/flashbots/mev-boost/server.TestRegisterValidator()
      /home/runner/work/mev-boost/mev-boost/server/service_test.go:196 +0x452
  testing.tRunner()
      /opt/hostedtoolcache/go/1.18.4/x64/src/testing/testing.go:1439 +0x213
  testing.(*T).Run.func1()
      /opt/hostedtoolcache/go/1.18.4/x64/src/testing/testing.go:1486 +0x47

Goroutine 18 (running) created at:
  net/http.(*Server).Serve()
      /opt/hostedtoolcache/go/1.18.4/x64/src/net/http/server.go:3071 +0x80c
  net/http/httptest.(*Server).goServe.func1()
      /opt/hostedtoolcache/go/1.18.4/x64/src/net/http/httptest/server.go:308 +0xb2
==================
```

That is here:

https://github.com/flashbots/mev-boost/blob/61354ae39dba77f4a09e855ec2685cf4362384b1/server/service_test.go#L207-L211

And here:

https://github.com/flashbots/mev-boost/blob/2c0e232c5712970214de128160152762e02b9894/server/mock_relay.go#L126-L129
yes, thanks for the report, also noticed it! not happening every time though ðŸ¤” cc/ @0xpanoramix
